titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of theatrical, ballet, and operatic scenery, properties, and sets.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/9/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment of articles to be used in theatrical, ballet, or operatic scenery, properties, or sets.
